00037 /**
00038  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00039  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00040  * @return SelfDoc
00041  */
00042 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::explainSelf()
00043 {
00044     CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism obj;
00045     SelfDoc doc;
00046     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00047     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00048     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00049     return doc;
00050 }
00051 
00052 /**
00053  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00054  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00055  */
00056 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getDefaultDocOptions()
00057 {
00058   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00059 
00060   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00061     SelfDoc::Opt gains_boundries = {"gains-boundries", SelfDoc::Opt::String,
00062         "0.08764945,0.15380349,0.21465931,0.27100300", "0.08764945,0.15380349,0.21465931,0.27100300", "", "", "Mosaicism Gains Boundries"};
00063     opts.push_back(gains_boundries);
00064 
00065     SelfDoc::Opt losses_boundries = {"losses-boundries", SelfDoc::Opt::String,
00066         "-0.08293345,-0.17551812,-0.28048196,-0.40165383", "-0.08293345,-0.17551812,-0.28048196,-0.40165383", "", "", "Mosaicism Losses Boundries"};
00067     opts.push_back(losses_boundries);
00068 
00069     SelfDoc::Opt marker_bandwidth = {"marker-bandwidth", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer,
00070         "6000", "6000", "1", "NA",
00071         "Mosaicism Marker Bandwitdth"};
00072     opts.push_back(marker_bandwidth);
00073 
00074     SelfDoc::Opt confidence_window = {"confidence-window", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer,
00075         "251", "251", "31", "NA",
00076         "Mosaicism confidence running median window size"};
00077     opts.push_back(confidence_window);
00078 
00079     SelfDoc::Opt run_y_chromosome = {"run-y-chromosome", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean,
00080         "true", "true", "NA", "NA",
00081         "Run Mosaicism analysis on Y Chromosome"};
00082     opts.push_back(run_y_chromosome);
00083 
00084   return opts;
00085 }

00087 /**
00088  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00089  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00090  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00091  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00092  *
00093  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00094  *
00095  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00096  */
00097 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00098 {
00099     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00100     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00101     CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism();
00102     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00103 
00104     AffxByteArray ba;
00105     AffxString str;
00106 
00107     // m_vGainsBoundries
00108     str = setupStringParameter("gains-boundries", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00109     ba.assign(str);
00110     ba.replace(",", " ");
00111     pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries.resize(ba.parameterCount());
00112     for (int k=0; k<ba.parameterCount(); k++)
00113     {
00114         pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries[k] = ba.getParameter(k+1).parseDouble();
00115     }
00116 
00117     // m_vLossesBoundries
00118     str = setupStringParameter("losses-boundries", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00119     ba.assign(str);
00120     ba.replace(",", " ");
00121     pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries.resize(ba.parameterCount());
00122     for (int k=0; k<ba.parameterCount(); k++)
00123     {
00124         pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries[k] = ba.getParameter(k+1).parseDouble();
00125     }
00126 
00127     // marker bandwidth
00128     pMethod->m_iMarkerBandwidth = setupIntParameter("marker-bandwidth", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00129     pMethod->m_iConfidenceWindow = setupIntParameter("confidence-window", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00130 
00131     if (pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries.size() != pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries.size())
00132     {
00133         throw(Except("losses-boundries must conform to gains-boundries."));
00134     }
00135 
00136     if ((pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries.size() != 4) || (pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries.size() != 4)) {throw(Except("gains-boundries and losses-boundries must contain four floating point numbers."));}
00137 
00138     for (int k=0; k<pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries.size(); k++)
00139     {
00140         if ((k > 0) && (pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries[k-1] > pMethod->m_vGainsBoundries[k])) {throw(Except("gains-boundries parameters must ordered increasing."));}
00141     }
00142 
00143     for (int k=0; k<pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries.size(); k++)
00144     {
00145         if ((k > 0) && (pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries[k-1] < pMethod->m_vLossesBoundries[k])) {throw(Except("losses-boundries parameters must ordered decreasing."));}
00146     }
00147 
00148     // run on Y chromosome
00149     pMethod->m_bRunYChromosome = setupBoolParameter("run-y-chromosome", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00150 
00151     return pMethod;
00152 }

00157 CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism()

00160     m_iConfidenceWindow = 0;
00161     m_iStartIndex = 0;
00162     m_iEndIndex = 0;

00164     m_bRunYChromosome=true;

00167 /**
00168  * @brief Run the analysis.
00169  */
00170 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::run()
00171 {
00172     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::run(...) start");
00173     isSetup();
00174         determineLocalProbeSets();
00175 
00176     m_vSegments.deleteAll();
00177     vector<int> vChromosomes = getChromosomes(getProbeSets());
00178     int iLastChromosome = vChromosomes[vChromosomes.size() - 1];
00179     Verbose::progressBegin(1,"CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::run(...) ", iLastChromosome, 1, iLastChromosome);
00180 
00181     for (int i = 0; (i < vChromosomes.size()); i++)
00182     {
00183         int iChromosome = vChromosomes[i];
00184         if (iChromosome == 255) {continue;}
00185         if (iChromosome == m_iYChromosome && !m_bRunYChromosome) {
00186           continue;
00187         }
00188         int iProbeSetCount = getProbeSetCount(iChromosome, getProbeSets());
00189         if (iProbeSetCount == 0) continue; // probably 23 or Y
00190         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00191 
00192         // debug: for later use
00193         m_current_experiment=getExperiment()->getExperimentName();
00194         m_current_chr=ToStr(vChromosomes[i]);
00195 
00196         std::vector<int> vPositions(iProbeSetCount);
00197         double* pLog2Ratios = new double[iProbeSetCount];
00198         int iStartChromosome = getChrBounds(iChromosome, getProbeSets()).first;
00199         m_iStartIndex = 0;
00200         m_iEndIndex = (iProbeSetCount - 1);
00201         CNProbeSetArray* psets = getProbeSets();
00202         for (int j = 0; (j < iProbeSetCount); j++)
00203         {
00204             vPositions[j] = psets->at(iStartChromosome + j)->getPosition();
00205             pLog2Ratios[j] = psets->at(iStartChromosome + j)->getLog2Ratio();
00206         }
00207         double* pRunMean = new double[iProbeSetCount];
00208         int iMarkerBandwidth = Min(iProbeSetCount, m_iMarkerBandwidth);
00209         runmean(pLog2Ratios, pRunMean, &iProbeSetCount, &iMarkerBandwidth);
00210 
00211         // debug - this has been ruled out.
00212 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG_MEANS
00213         writeRunningMeans(m_current_experiment+".chr"+m_current_chr+".means.tsv",
00214                           iProbeSetCount,
00215                           pLog2Ratios,
00216                           pRunMean);
00217 #endif
00218 
00219         CNSegmentArray vSegments;
00220         newSegments((unsigned char)iChromosome, pRunMean, iProbeSetCount, vPositions, vSegments);
00221         // dont need this anymore.
00222         delete[] pRunMean;
00223 
00224         // debug
00225 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00226         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".newseg1.tsv");
00227 #endif
00228         //
00229         cleanSegments(vSegments);
00230 
00231         // Set marker count and median marker distance.
00232         for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++)
00233         {
00234             CNSegment* p = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00235             p->setStartPosition(vPositions[p->getStartIndex()]);
00236             p->setEndPosition(vPositions[p->getEndIndex()]);
00237             calculateSegmentConfidence(pLog2Ratios, p);
00238             int iMarkerCount = 0;
00239             for (unsigned int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < vPositions.size()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00240             {
00241                 if ((vPositions[iProbeSetIndex] >= p->getStartPosition()) && (vPositions[iProbeSetIndex] <= p->getEndPosition()))
00242                 {
00243                     iMarkerCount++;
00244                 }
00245             }
00246             if (iMarkerCount < 2)
00247             {
00248                 p->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00249                 p->setMeanMarkerDistance(0);
00250             }
00251             else
00252             {
00253                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vMarkerDistances(iMarkerCount - 1);
00254                 int iIndex = 0;
00255                 for (unsigned int iProbeSetIndex = 1; (iProbeSetIndex < vPositions.size()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00256                 {
00257                     int iPrevPosition = vPositions[iProbeSetIndex - 1];
00258                     int iNextPosition = vPositions[iProbeSetIndex];
00259                     if ((iPrevPosition >= p->getStartPosition()) && (iNextPosition <= p->getEndPosition()))
00260                     {
00261                         getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartChromosome + iProbeSetIndex - 1)->setMosaicismMixture(p->getMixtureAsDouble());
00262                         getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartChromosome + iProbeSetIndex)->setMosaicismMixture(p->getMixtureAsDouble());
00263                         vMarkerDistances.set(iIndex, (iNextPosition - iPrevPosition));
00264                         iIndex++;
00265                     }
00266                 }
00267                 p->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
00268                 p->setMeanMarkerDistance(vMarkerDistances.mean());
00269             }
00270             // transfer of ownership from vSegments to m_vSegments
00271             m_vSegments.add(p);
00272         }
00273 
00274 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00275         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".seg2.tsv");
00276 #endif
00277         // why "nullAll()" instead of "deleteAll()"?
00278         // because the pointers were copied to m_vSegments above and
00279         // AffxArray will delete the pointers in vSegments when it goes out of scope.
00280         vSegments.nullAll();
00281         delete[] pLog2Ratios;
00282     }
00283     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00284     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::run(...) end");
00285 }
00286 
00287 
00288 // This function produces an initial segmentation.
00289 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::newSegments(unsigned char cChromosome, 
00290                                             double* pRunMean, 
00291                                             int iProbeSetCount, 
00292                                             std::vector<int>& vPositions, 
00293                                             CNSegmentArray& vSegments)
00294 {
00295     double dNeutralZoneLow = m_vLossesBoundries[0];
00296     double dNeutralZoneHigh = m_vGainsBoundries[0];
00297     int iStartIndex = 0;
00298     int iEndIndex = 0;
00299     int iIndex = 0;
00300     double dCurrentMax = 0;
00301 
00302 //    int last_vSegments_size=vSegments.size();
00303     while (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1))
00304     {
00305         iStartIndex = iIndex;
00306 
00307         if (((dNeutralZoneLow < pRunMean[iIndex]) && (pRunMean[iIndex] <= dNeutralZoneHigh)) ||
00308             (pRunMean[iIndex] != pRunMean[iIndex]))
00309         {
00310             // it's a no-call segment
00311             while ((((dNeutralZoneLow < pRunMean[iIndex]) && (pRunMean[iIndex] <= dNeutralZoneHigh)) ||
00312                     (pRunMean[iIndex] != pRunMean[iIndex])) && (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)))
00313             {
00314               iIndex++;
00315             }
00316             iEndIndex = iIndex;
00317             if (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)) {iEndIndex--;}
00318             if (iEndIndex < iStartIndex) {iEndIndex = iStartIndex;}
00319             CNSegment* pSegment = new CNSegment();
00320             pSegment->setCall(0);
00321             pSegment->setConfidence(0.5);
00322             pSegment->setSegmentType(getSegmentType());
00323             pSegment->setChromosome(cChromosome);
00324             pSegment->setStartIndex(iStartIndex);
00325             pSegment->setEndIndex(iEndIndex);
00326             pSegment->setStartPosition(vPositions[iStartIndex]);
00327             pSegment->setEndPosition(vPositions[iEndIndex]);
00328             pSegment->setMixture(MCLASS_00);
00329             pSegment->setCalibratedCN(getCalibratedCN(0, pSegment->getChromosome()));
00330             vSegments.add(pSegment);
00331         }
00332         else if (pRunMean[iIndex] <= dNeutralZoneLow)
00333         {
00334             // it's a loss region
00335             dCurrentMax = pRunMean[iIndex];
00336             while ((pRunMean[iIndex] < dNeutralZoneLow) && (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)))
00337             {
00338                 iIndex++;
00339                 if (pRunMean[iIndex] < dCurrentMax) {dCurrentMax = pRunMean[iIndex];}
00340             }
00341             iEndIndex = iIndex;
00342             if (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)) {iEndIndex--;}
00343             if (iEndIndex < iStartIndex) {iEndIndex = iStartIndex;}
00344 
00345             CNSegment* pSegment = new CNSegment();
00346             pSegment->setCall(1);
00347             pSegment->setConfidence(0.5);
00348             pSegment->setSegmentType(getSegmentType());
00349             pSegment->setChromosome(cChromosome);
00350             pSegment->setStartIndex(iStartIndex);
00351             pSegment->setEndIndex(iEndIndex);
00352             pSegment->setStartPosition(vPositions[iStartIndex]);
00353             pSegment->setEndPosition(vPositions[iEndIndex]);
00354             pSegment->setMixture(MosaicClassNeg(getMosaicClass(dCurrentMax, m_vLossesBoundries)));
00355             pSegment->setCalibratedCN(getCalibratedCN(dCurrentMax, pSegment->getChromosome()));
00356             double tmp=pSegment->getMixtureAsDouble();
00357             if (((int)tmp)==tmp) {
00358               pSegment->setCall(0);
00359             }
00360             vSegments.add(pSegment);
00361         }
00362         else
00363         {
00364             // it's a gain region       
00365             dCurrentMax = pRunMean[iIndex];
00366             while ((pRunMean[iIndex] > dNeutralZoneHigh) && (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)))
00367             {
00368                 iIndex++;
00369                 if (pRunMean[iIndex] > dCurrentMax) {dCurrentMax = pRunMean[iIndex];}
00370             }
00371             iEndIndex = iIndex;
00372             if (iIndex < (iProbeSetCount - 1)) {iEndIndex--;}
00373             if (iEndIndex < iStartIndex) {iEndIndex = iStartIndex;}
00374 
00375             CNSegment* pSegment = new CNSegment();
00376             pSegment->setCall(1);
00377             pSegment->setConfidence(0.5);
00378             pSegment->setSegmentType(getSegmentType());
00379             pSegment->setChromosome(cChromosome);
00380             pSegment->setStartIndex(iStartIndex);
00381             pSegment->setEndIndex(iEndIndex);
00382             pSegment->setStartPosition(vPositions[iStartIndex]);
00383             pSegment->setEndPosition(vPositions[iEndIndex]);
00384             pSegment->setMixture(getMosaicClass(dCurrentMax, m_vGainsBoundries));
00385             pSegment->setCalibratedCN(getCalibratedCN(dCurrentMax, pSegment->getChromosome()));
00386             //float fMixture = pSegment->getMixture();
00387             double tmp=pSegment->getMixtureAsDouble();
00388             if (((int)tmp)==tmp) {
00389               pSegment->setCall(0);
00390             }
00391             vSegments.add(pSegment);
00392         }
00393 
00394 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG_PSEG
00395         CNSegment* ts=vSegments[vSegments.size()-1];
00396         printf("### PSeg: new seg: idx:%d-%d pos:%d-%d mix=%d\n",
00397                ts->getStartIndex(),ts->getEndIndex(),
00398                ts->getStartPosition(),ts->getEndPosition(),
00399                ts->getMixture());
00400 #endif
00401     }
00402 }
00403 
00404 
00405 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::cleanSegments(CNSegmentArray& vSegments)
00406 {
00407 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00408   vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-1.tsv");
00409 #endif
00410 
00411   // 20 is marker index count, not bp
00412   int iMinSegmentSize = 20;
00413 
00414   // R: set the mixture to MCLASS_00 for small segments.
00415   //   region.size <- x[,2] - x[,1]
00416   //   x[region.size < min.size,3] <- 0
00417   for (int idx1=0;idx1<vSegments.getCount();idx1++) {
00418         CNSegment* p = vSegments.getAt(idx1);
00419         if (p->getIndexLen()<iMinSegmentSize) {
00420             p->setCall(0);
00421             p->setConfidence(0.5);
00422             p->setMixture(MCLASS_00);
00423             p->setCalibratedCN(getCalibratedCN(0, p->getChromosome()));
00424         }
00425   }
00426 
00427   //
00428   CNSegmentArray tmp_segments;
00429   CNSegment* p1;
00430   int idx1=0;
00431   while (idx1<vSegments.getCount()) {
00432     p1=vSegments.getAt(idx1);
00433     tmp_segments.push_back(p1);
00434     vSegments.setAt(idx1,NULL);
00435     idx1++;
00436 
00437 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00438     printf("%3d: p1->getMixtureAsDouble()=%f\n",idx1,p1->getMixtureAsDouble());
00439 #endif
00440 
00441     // keep non-zeros as is.
00442     if (p1->getMixture()!=MCLASS_00) {
00443       continue;
00444     }
00445 
00446     // a zero, gobble up the other zeros
00447     while ((idx1<vSegments.getCount()) &&
00448            (vSegments.getAt(idx1)->getMixture()==MCLASS_00)) {
00449        p1->setEndIndex(vSegments.getAt(idx1)->getEndIndex());
00450        delete vSegments.getAt(idx1);
00451        vSegments.setAt(idx1,NULL);
00452        idx1++;
00453     }
00454   }
00455   vSegments.nullAll();
00456   vSegments.clear();
00457   vSegments=tmp_segments;
00458   tmp_segments.nullAll();
00459 
00460 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00461         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-2.tsv");
00462 #endif
00463 
00464     // Now the hard part, fixing the boundries.
00465     // First we enlarge or shrink the regions where a CN change is detected.
00466     if (vSegments.getCount() <= 1)
00467     {
00468         return;
00469     }
00470 
00471     int iSegmentIndex = 0;
00472     CNSegment* p2;
00473 
00474     for (iSegmentIndex = 0; iSegmentIndex < (vSegments.getCount() - 1); iSegmentIndex++) {
00475         p1 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00476         p2 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex + 1);
00477         // first case *p1 has no CN change and *p2 has cn change
00478         if (p1->getMixture() == MCLASS_00 && p2->getMixture() != MCLASS_00) {
00479             p2->setStartIndex(Max(1, (p2->getStartIndex() + getBoundaryAdjustment(p2->getMixture()))));
00480             p1->setEndIndex(p2->getStartIndex() - 1);
00481 
00482         }
00483         // second case *p1 has CN change and *p2 has no cn change
00484         else if (p1->getMixture() != MCLASS_00 && p2->getMixture() == MCLASS_00) {
00485             p1->setEndIndex(Max(0, (p1->getEndIndex() - getBoundaryAdjustment(p1->getMixture()))));
00486             p2->setStartIndex((p1->getEndIndex() + 1));
00487         }
00488         // otherwise p1 and p2 have CN change - don't adjust
00489     }
00490 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00491     vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-3.tsv");
00492 #endif
00493 
00494     // Check for segments where mixture = 0 and start > end, and remove them.
00495     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++)
00496     {
00497         CNSegment* p = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00498         if ((p->getMixture() == MCLASS_00) &&
00499             (p->getStartIndex() > p->getEndIndex()))
00500         {
00501             CNSegment* p2 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00502             vSegments.setAt(iSegmentIndex,NULL);
00503             vSegments.removeAt(iSegmentIndex);
00504             delete p2;
00505             iSegmentIndex--;
00506         }
00507     }
00508 
00509 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00510         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-4.tsv");
00511 #endif
00512 
00513     // Check for segments out of bounds and trim as needed.
00514     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < vSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++)
00515     {
00516         CNSegment* p = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00517         if (p->getStartIndex() < m_iStartIndex) {p->setStartIndex(m_iStartIndex);}
00518         if (p->getStartIndex() > m_iEndIndex) {p->setStartIndex(m_iEndIndex);}
00519         if (p->getEndIndex() < m_iStartIndex) {p->setEndIndex(m_iStartIndex);}
00520         if (p->getEndIndex() > m_iEndIndex) {p->setEndIndex(m_iEndIndex);}
00521     }
00522 
00523     // Join adjacent segments with same Mixture value. What to do about calibratedCN? Take max of min depending on sign of Mixture.
00524     // Adjust end points of overlapping segments with different mixture value
00525     for (int iSegmentIndex1 = 0; (iSegmentIndex1 < (vSegments.getCount() - 1)); iSegmentIndex1++)
00526     {
00527         p1 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex1);
00528         p2 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex1 + 1);
00529         while (p1->getMixture() == p2->getMixture()) {
00530           // if segments are ajacent then join and go on to next segment
00531           if (p2->getStartIndex() <= p1->getEndIndex() + 1) {
00532              // Overlap exists.
00533              p1->setStartIndex(Min(p1->getStartIndex(), p2->getStartIndex()));
00534              p1->setEndIndex(Max(p1->getEndIndex(), p2->getEndIndex()));
00535              if (p1->getMixtureAsDouble() > 0.0)
00536              {
00537                  p1->setCalibratedCN(Max(p1->getCalibratedCN(), p2->getCalibratedCN()));
00538              }
00539              else
00540              {
00541                  p1->setCalibratedCN(Min(p1->getCalibratedCN(), p2->getCalibratedCN()));
00542              }
00543              vSegments.setAt(iSegmentIndex1 + 1, NULL);
00544              vSegments.removeAt(iSegmentIndex1 + 1);
00545              delete p2;
00546              if (iSegmentIndex1 < vSegments.getCount() - 1) {
00547                p2 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex1 + 1);
00548              }
00549              else {
00550                // last segment
00551                break;
00552              }
00553           }
00554           else {
00555             // not adjacent
00556             break;
00557           }
00558         }
00559     }
00560 
00561 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00562         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-5.tsv");
00563 #endif
00564 
00565     // Remove any overlaps by adjusting the start of each segment to be after the end point of the previous segment.
00566     // If any segments have negative size delete them
00567     //
00568     int iLastEnd = 0;
00569     for (int iSegmentIndex1 = 0; iSegmentIndex1 < vSegments.getCount(); iSegmentIndex1++)
00570     {
00571         p1 = vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex1);
00572         // make sure start is after last end point
00573         if (p1->getStartIndex() < iLastEnd) {
00574           p1->setStartIndex(iLastEnd);
00575         }
00576         // check for end < start
00577         if (p1->getEndIndex() < p1->getStartIndex()) {
00578           // delete p1
00579           delete p1;
00580           vSegments.removeAt(iSegmentIndex1);
00581           iSegmentIndex1--;
00582           continue;
00583         }
00584         // set next end point + 1
00585         iLastEnd = p1->getEndIndex() + 1;
00586     }
00587 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00588         vSegments.writeToTsv(m_current_experiment+"-chr"+m_current_chr+".segclean-6.tsv");
00589 #endif
00590 }
00591 
00592 
00593 // This function determines which class the mosaic falls into
00594 // R-func: get.mos.prop
00595 MosaicClass_t CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getMosaicClass(double dMostExtreme, std::vector<double>& vBoundries)
00596 {
00597     if (fabs(dMostExtreme) >= fabs(vBoundries[3])) {
00598       return MCLASS_p10;
00599     }
00600     if (fabs(dMostExtreme) >= fabs(vBoundries[2])) {
00601       return MCLASS_p07;
00602     }
00603     if (fabs(dMostExtreme) >= fabs(vBoundries[1])) {
00604       return MCLASS_p05;
00605     }
00606     if (fabs(dMostExtreme) >= fabs(vBoundries[0])) {
00607       return MCLASS_p03;
00608     }
00609     return MCLASS_00;
00610 }
00611 
00612 float CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getCalibratedCN(double dCurrentMax)
00613 {
00614     dCurrentMax /= m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-cn-calibrate");
00615     dCurrentMax += m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-cn-calibrate");
00616     return (float)exp(dCurrentMax*log(2.0));
00617 }
00618 
00619 float CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getCalibratedCN(double dCurrentMax, int chromosome)
00620 {
00621     double alphaCalibrate;
00622     double betaCalibrate;
00623     if (chromosome < m_iXChromosome) {
00624         alphaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-cn-calibrate");
00625         betaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-cn-calibrate");
00626     }
00627     else if (chromosome == m_iXChromosome) {
00628         alphaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-X-cn-calibrate");
00629         betaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-X-cn-calibrate");
00630     }
00631     else if (chromosome == m_iYChromosome) {
00632         alphaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate");
00633         betaCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-Y-cn-calibrate");
00634     }
00635     else {
00636         alphaCalibrate = 1.0;
00637         betaCalibrate = 0.0;
00638     }
00639     dCurrentMax /= alphaCalibrate;
00640     dCurrentMax += betaCalibrate;
00641     return (float)exp(dCurrentMax*log(2.0));
00642 }
00643 
00644 // This function determines how to adjust the segment boundaries
00645 // R-func: GetBoundaryAdjustment
00646 //int CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getBoundaryAdjustment(double dMosaicClass)
00647 int getBoundaryAdjustment_arr[]=
00648   { 0,     // Bad
00649     2165,  // n10
00650     1777,  // n07
00651     1054,  // n05
00652     -1780, // n03
00653     0,     // _00 - no change
00654     -2128, // p03
00655     209,   // p05
00656     909,   // p07
00657     1342   // p10
00658   };
00659 int CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::getBoundaryAdjustment(MosaicClass_t val)
00660 {
00661   assert((MCLASS_n10<=val) && (val<=MCLASS_p10));
00662   return getBoundaryAdjustment_arr[val];
00663 }
00664 
00665 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::runmed(double* p, int iCount, int iWindowSize)
00666 {
00667     std::vector<float>vOut(iCount);
00668     if ((iWindowSize % 2) == 0) {iWindowSize++;} // Window size should be odd.
00669     if (iCount <= iWindowSize)
00670     {
00671         iWindowSize = iCount - 2;
00672         if ((iWindowSize % 2) == 0) {iWindowSize--;} // Window size should be odd.
00673         if (iWindowSize < 0) {return;}
00674     }
00675     int iHalfWindow = (int)((double)iWindowSize/2.0);
00676     for (int iIndex = iHalfWindow; (iIndex < (iCount - iHalfWindow)); iIndex++)
00677     {
00678         vOut[iIndex] = percentile(50, (p + iIndex - iHalfWindow), iWindowSize);
00679     }
00680     for (int iIndex = (iHalfWindow - 1); (iIndex >= 0); iIndex--)
00681     {
00682         vOut[iIndex] = vOut[iIndex + 1];
00683     }
00684     for (int iIndex = (iCount - iHalfWindow); (iIndex < iCount); iIndex++)
00685     {
00686         vOut[iIndex] = vOut[iIndex - 1];
00687     }
00688     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iCount); iIndex++)
00689     {
00690         p[iIndex] = vOut[iIndex];
00691     }
00692 }
00693 
00694 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::calculateSegmentConfidence(double* pRunMean, CNSegment* p)
00695 {
00696     // iCount should be positive, but was "-312", causing an abort.
00697     int iCount = p->getEndIndex() - p->getStartIndex() + 1;
00698     if (iCount<=1) {
00699 #ifdef MOSAICISM_DEBUG
00700       printf("calculateSegmentConfidence: iCount=%d start=%d end=%d\n",
00701              iCount,
00702              p->getStartIndex(),
00703              p->getEndIndex());
00704 #endif
00705       return;
00706     }
00707     double* pData = new double[iCount];
00708     int i1 = 0;
00709     for (int i = p->getStartIndex(); (i <= p->getEndIndex()); i++)
00710     {
00711         pData[i1] = pRunMean[i]; i1++;
00712     }
00713     runmed(pData, iCount, m_iConfidenceWindow);
00714     double dSum = 0;
00715     for (int i = 0; (i < iCount); i++)
00716     {
00717         if ((p->getMixtureAsDouble() >= 0.0) && (pData[i] > m_vGainsBoundries[0])) {dSum++;}
00718         if ((p->getMixtureAsDouble() <= 0.0) && (pData[i] < m_vLossesBoundries[0])) {dSum++;}
00719     }
00720     if (iCount == 0) {p->setConfidence(0);}
00721     else
00722     {
00723         double d = fabs(dSum / (double)iCount);
00724         if (d > 1) {d = 1;}
00725         p->setConfidence((float)d);
00726     }
00727     delete[] pData;
00728 }
00729 
00730 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::determineLocalProbeSets()
00731 {
00732         if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00733         {
00734                 return;
00735         }
00736         int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00737         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00738         {
00739                 if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsCN() )
00740                 {
00741                         getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00742                 }
00743         }
00744         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00745 }
00746 
00747 void CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::writeRunningMeans(const std::string& path,
00748                                                   int cnt,
00749                                                   double* pLog2Ratios,
00750                                                   double* pRunMean)
00751 {
00752   Verbose::out(1,std::string("CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::writeRunningMeans: ")+path);
00753   
00754   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00755   tsv.setPrecision(15); // match R digits
00756   tsv.defineFile("i\tlog2\tmean");
00757   tsv.addHeader("m_current_chr",m_current_chr);
00758   tsv.addHeader("m_current_experiment",m_current_experiment);
00759   tsv.writeTsv(path);
00760   
00761   for (int i=0;i<cnt;i++) {
00762     tsv.set(0,0,i);
00763     tsv.set(0,1,pLog2Ratios[i]);
00764     tsv.set(0,2,pRunMean[i]);
00765     tsv.writeLevel(0);
00766   }
00767   tsv.close();
00768 }
